Container.Name: Tvheadend-Unstable-DVB-Tuners
Container.Overview: This is a template with pass through of 1 DVB Tuner.[br] This is the unstable branch of Tvheadend and is now at version 3.9.2345~gf5c8e4c.[br] Tvheadend is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-C, DVB-T, ATSC, IPTV, SAT>IP and HDHomeRun as input sources.[br] The Analog video (V4L) is supported directly up to version 3.4.[br] In recent version, the pipe:// source (in IPTV network) might be used to obtain the MPEG-TS stream generated by ffmpeg/libav from a V4L device.
Container.Description: This is a template with pass through of all your DVB Tuners.[br] Tvheadend is a TV streaming server. It's possible to pass through a DVB adapter. Instructions on how to do that is in the support thread. It is compiled with support for HDHomerun.[br] http://tvheadend.org[br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Directions:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s databases and configuration.[br][br] [b]/recordings[/b] : This is where Tvheadend will store it\'s recordings. You will have to edit the path in the configuration tab to /recordings or else the volume mapping will not work.[br][br] [b]/data[/b] : This is where the tv_grab_wg script will look for the guide.xml. This is only for use with WebGrab+Plus. Ignore if you do not use WebGrab+Plus for EPG data.[br][br]
